2050870.name: Internet Exploring
2050870.description:
The Internet is more than just selfies and cat videos. It is still heavily used to find necessary information to solve a problem which makes it the perfect escape room. In this game it is your task to solve riddles whose answers are hidden in the vastness of the Web. Can’t imagine what that would look like? Try it out for free at our official website.

Workshop

When you solved everything in our riddles list, head over to Workshop where you can find riddles created by other players. Feel free to contact us if you have any riddle ideas!

About riddles

The riddles are organized in groups of four and the clues of the last riddle are usually the solutions of three previous riddles. Clues could be anything from text and images to complex mini-puzzles. Got stuck? You can always use help that will nudge you in the right direction. Sometimes clues can be hidden and they get revealed when another clue is solved. Also, sometimes clues get marked by the same border color to indicate that they should be looked up together.



Go to our official website and play the first couple of riddles for free!
